info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 5:53AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE WESTERN SOUTHERN TIER... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less a half mile. This area of heavy snow is producing heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 1.5 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 547 AM EST, the heavy snow extended along and just east of the Chautauqua Ridge and into some of the higher terrain of the Western Southern Tier and far southern Erie County. The heavy snow will remain nearly stationary through 715 AM EST. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Jamestown, Fredonia, Westfield, Lakewood, Gowanda, Falconer, Mayville, Clymer, Long Point State Park, Jamestown West, Ashford Hollow, Chautauqua Institution, Findley Lake, Chautauqua, Collins, Ripley, Stockton, New Albion, Gerry and Dayton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 61. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 16. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
